definition: perennial of northern hemisphere with slender stems and bell-shaped blue flowers
details:
noun
- perennial of northern hemisphere with slender stems and bell-shaped blue flowers
= synonyms: harebell
- one of the most handsome prairie wildflowers having large erect bell-shaped bluish flowers
= synonyms: prairie gentian, tulip gentian
- sometimes placed in genus Scilla
= synonyms: harebell, wild hyacinth, wood hyacinth
